valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 8 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 9 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Atlantic low expected cornwall 969 by 1800 Thursday. Low west of Bailey 997 expected Bailey 986 by same time. Low German Bight 996 losing its identity
